attributes.action: enact legislation to bar complainants who are not present in the UK from suing the UK government in an English court
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In view of American "shock jock's" plan to sue the UK government for defamation, this move would ensure the UK government's right to refuse entry to the UK to anybody it sees fit, for any reason it sees fit. Simply make sure that in order to sue in an English court, the complainant actually has to be present.
